messages.content: Hi, thank you for calling Nestlé customer service. My name is Fred. May I know your name, please?
My name is Nicole. I'm really frustrated right now!
I'm sorry to hear that you're upset, Nicole. How can I assist you today?
I need information about your Maggi Soy Sauce. I've been trying to find details online but it's just not clear!
I understand your frustration, Nicole. What specific information are you looking for regarding Maggi Soy Sauce?
I want to know what ingredients are in it. I have food allergies and can't find a clear list anywhere!
I apologize for the inconvenience, Nicole. The Maggi Soy Sauce contains water, soybeans, wheat, salt, and preservatives. Are there any specific allergens you're concerned about?
Yes, I'm allergic to wheat! Why isn't this information easily available on your website?

I understand your concern, Nicole. We strive to make all ingredient information accessible, but it seems we need to improve our online resources. I will escalate your feedback to the relevant team. Is there anything else I can help you with?
No, just make sure this gets fixed. It's really important for people with allergies!
Absolutely, Nicole. We take food allergies seriously and I will ensure your feedback is forwarded to the right department. Thank you for bringing this to our attention.
